title: Guiding Light
lyrics:
[Verse]
Pure hearts stumble
In my hands, they crumble
Fragile and stripped to the core
I can't hurt you anymore
Loved by numbers
You're losing life's wonder
Touch like strangers; detached
I can't feel you anymore
[Chorus 1]
The sunshine trapped in our hearts
It could rise again
But I'm lost, crushed
Cold and confused
With no guiding light left inside
[Post-Chorus]
You were my guiding light
[Guitar Solo]
[Chorus 2]
When comfort
And warmth can't be found I still reach for you
But I'm lost, crushed
Cold and confused
With no guiding light left inside

[Post-Chorus]
You're my guiding light
You're my guiding light
[Outro]
When there's no guiding light left inside
When there's no guiding light in our lives
